about_the_game:
Streams Upon Memories is a psychological horror set in a surreal plane, questioning reality and what's really true. You wake up, not knowing who or even what you are, in an ethereal location, not sure what the hell you're doing up here.

10k words.
8 CGs.
4 main different endings.
2 characters.
One location.

Original soundtracks.

Custom GUI.
Voice acting.

Directed by Kashi Maadsen.

ART

content_descriptors.notes: This game is dealing with topics of mental health and isn’t meant for people under the age of 15 and/or sensitive people.

name: Streams Upon Memories : Dawn of the Fractured Mind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics

reviews:
“What an incredibly atmospheric and surreal treat this is! It feels like a dream-like puzzle, where pieces keep moving and shifting; I'm going to have to go back again and see if I can proceed further, but I'm well and truly intrigued. Beautiful work!”
Butterfly Rocket Studios

“I'm in love with the little piece of a gigantic story we have in thiiiiis ! Your work is amazing. And to be honest, i'm looking forward to see the final game, if a final game there is ; because I think the idea deserve at least an entire game. Good joooooooob, thank you for your work and time on this !”
velkienoff
short_description: Awaken in a world plunged into uncertainty. You must navigate hidden truths and make crucial choices. Will you uncover the secrets of your existence? Your path will determine your fate in this journey.
